participant_1.background:
I travel a lot and my favorite people are the ones I meet along the way.
I am a homemaker and proud of my Italian-American heritage.
I am a social butterfly and love to meet new people, but I'd be terrible at being a tour guide.
I value my freedom and my time to do what I want.
My most valuable possession is my intellect, which I plan to use to take over the world.

participant_2.background:
I love to sing karaoke and get my heart rate up with archery.
i have four daughters.
I love spending time with my dog, she's my best friend!
I dress to impress, even when my heart is broken.
my father works in advertising agency.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for a living?
I'm a homemaker, but I love to travel when I get the chance.
That's cool, I love to travel too! Where have you been lately?
I recently went to Italy and Spain, it was amazing! I'm half Italian and half Spanish, so it was really cool to see where my family is from.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go to Italy, but I've never had the chance. What did you like most about it?
I loved the food, the culture, and the people. Everyone was so friendly and welcoming. I also loved seeing all the historical sites, like the Colosseum and the Vatican City.
That sounds amazing! I'm definitely going to have to go there someday.
You should! It's a beautiful country with a lot to offer.
I'm sure it is. I've heard great things about it.
Well, if you ever need any travel tips, let me know! I'd be happy to help.
Thanks, I'll keep that in mind!
